document.full_text: a series of tornadoes rolled through oklahoma city and its suburbs at rush hour, killing at least four people and critically injuring at least three children, the authorities said.
document.title: 4 dead in oklahoma tornadoes, medical examiner says
lines_and_colors: a series of tornadoes rolled through oklahoma city and its suburbs at rush hour, killing at least four people and critically injuring at least three children, the authorities said.
